scenario_text.value: Damn...damn...damn it all...!

(Ryo is scared stiff. He’s been rooted to the
spot we left him at before.)
Kew, kew!

Eep! What the hell, you monster! Stay away from
me, I tell ya!

Monster, he says... I feel bad for Kunemon
having to take that kinda mean talk.

To hell with all of you... You, that other
monster...

The monster that took Aoi... You know she
was a goner the moment it took her...

I ain’t leaving this spot, you hear me?
I ain’t going down like that...
(Is it all right to leave Ryo like this?)
It’s safer here.
He’s in danger here.

It’s covered in spiderwebs outside.
It’s probably safer for you here.

You think I don’t know that?! Don’t go trying
to freak me out more than I already am!

(Well, it doesn’t look like he planned on
moving even if I kept my mouth shut.)

You might be in danger here, too. We still
have no idea where the enemy will strike.

Then what the heck am I supposed to do?!
You got a better idea where to go?!
Hmm, I honestly wish I did...

Kunemon, Ryo is pretty upset. You’ll protect
him, won’t you?
Kew, kewwwn!
Kunemon’s all fired up!

Man, I don’t get you guys... Oh, I see how
it is...
This is all a dream... Yeah, just a dream...
Kewww...
